summary: Implementation plan for Phase 35 Tenant RBAC system. Covers database schema changes (3 new models, 2 new enums, User model update), backend services (TenantPermissionService with caching, TenantRolesService/Controller, guard and decorator), service integration across 6 existing modules, frontend API/hooks/components, and 3 full-page UIs (RolesListPage, RoleEditorPage, TenantPermissionsMatrix). Includes verification plan with both automated and manual testing steps.
